Title: Requires the New York state public high school athletic association to establish a central committee, an executive committee, and state sport committees
Summary: Directs the commissioner of health to promulgate rules and regulations requiring the New York state public high school athletic association to establish a central committee, an executive committee, and state sport committees.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring the New York state public high school athletic association to establish a central committee, an executive committee, and state sport committees
